content: Ik weet niet of het toeval is, maar het getoonde bericht lijkt een phishingbericht te zijn (ondanks het gebruik van kliksafe) en zou ik sowieso niet openen. Wellicht bevat het bericht ook niet meer dan dat. Als er andere voorbeelden zijn van legitieme berichten kunnen we verder kijken. Gelieve wel schermafdrukken te ontdoen van privégegevens zoals e-mailadressen!
creator: Mozilla-assistent

content:
Vuol dire che hai esaurito lo spazio sulla tua casella email. O compri altro spazio dal tuo fornitore, o cancelli la posta che non ti serve più

Non è comunque un problema di Thunderbird che ti sta solo avvisando della situazione.
creator: @next

content: Meer info daarover is te vinden op: https://support.mozilla.org/nl/kb/thunderbird-release.
creator: Mozilla-assistent

content:
Running in TroubleShoot mode makes things slightly better, in that T'bird remains responsive and does eventually display the message. Scrolling through the message remains very slow. May be a combination of overall message length and the length of some of the mail log output.

Probably also worth mentioning that this is the Snap version of T'bird. RAM usage balloons from 600K to 1.8Gb and counting!

According to Claws email the message is 510Mb in length/ It defaults to just showing the first 1Mb and then giving the option to load the entire message. The Flatpak version of Thunderbird is attempting to load the message and is managing, albeit very slowly, while the app itself lags by about 2 seconds.
creator: osavill
